remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是用于访问到托管类，从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 类发现类构造函数的属性，并提供对构造函数元数据的访问权限。The class discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata. 接口保留的 vtable 顺序类可以访问由非托管 COM 对象的成员。The interface preserves the vtable order of the class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
